facial_services.title: Classic Cleanup
facial_services.view_details: Basic cleanup with scrubbing, steaming, and pack
facial_services.description: Removes dirt and blackheads for a fresh look. Ideal for quick maintenance between facials.

facial_services.title: De-Tan Facial
facial_services.view_details: Tan removal treatment with brightening ingredients
facial_services.description: Lightens sun tan, evens out skin tone and restores natural glow with fruit-based products.

facial_services.title: Gold Facial
facial_services.view_details: Gold-infused facial for glow and rejuvenation
facial_services.description: Enriched with 24K gold extracts, this facial enhances skin radiance and reduces fine lines.

facial_services.title: Pearl Facial
facial_services.description: Improves complexion and reduces pigmentation for a luminous and even-toned skin.

facial_services.title: Fruit Facial
facial_services.view_details: Natural fruit-based facial for sensitive skin
facial_services.description: Gentle and nourishing facial that revitalizes skin with the power of natural fruit extracts.

facial_services.title: Anti-Aging Facial
facial_services.view_details: Advanced facial targeting wrinkles and sagging skin
facial_services.description: Stimulates collagen production and firms skin for a youthful and lifted appearance.

facial_services.title: Skin Whitening Facial
facial_services.description: Reduces blemishes and pigmentation while improving skin clarity and radiance.
